explains: n. 恢复力，复原力；（橡胶等的）弹性

sentences.en: Do you feel that your muscles do not have the strength and resilience that they should have?
sentences.cn: 你觉得你的肌肉不具备它应有的力量和弹性了吗？

sentences.en: So how do we recover and build resilience?
sentences.cn: 那么我们如何恢复和建立韧性呢？

sentences.en: This kind of stability is also called resilience.
sentences.cn: 这种稳定性也被称为弹性。
